buildCommand: cd ../.. && if [ "$VERCEL_ENV" = preview ] && [ "$IS_OAUTH_PROXY_SERVER" != true ]; then export NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL=https://$VERCEL_URL && turbo run build --filter={apps/web}...; else turbo run build --filter={apps/web}...; fi
installCommand: cd ../.. && corepack enable && bash clone-marketing.sh && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile
